docs.snippet: Emirates has rejected claims by Lufthansa and Air France-KLM in a letter to the EU that competition from Gulf airlines had forced them to terminate services to Asia....
docs.lead_paragraph: Emirates has rejected claims by Lufthansa and Air France-KLM in a letter to the EU that competition from Gulf airlines had forced them to terminate services to Asia.

headline.main: Emirates Rejects Lufthansa, Air France-KLM Claims in Letter to EU

docs.snippet: The Syrian army said on Thursday it had recaptured the ancient city of Palmyra from Islamic State for the second time in a year, with help from allied forces and Russian warplanes....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Syrian army said on Thursday it had recaptured the ancient city of Palmyra from Islamic State for the second time in a year, with help from allied forces and Russian warplanes.

headline.main: Syrian Army Announces Recapture of Palmyra From Islamic State
headline.print_headline: Syrian Army Announces Recapture of Palmyra From Islamic State

docs.snippet: Once famous mobile phones such as Nokia's classic 3310 from the turn of the century have been given a new lease of life as Chinese manufacturers revive Western brands to get an edge in an increasingly cut-throat handset market....
docs.lead_paragraph: Once famous mobile phones such as Nokia's classic 3310 from the turn of the century have been given a new lease of life as Chinese manufacturers revive Western brands to get an edge in an increasingly cut-throat handset market.

headline.main: Vintage Western Phone Brands Resurrected by Chinese Players
headline.print_headline: Vintage Western Phone Brands Resurrected by Chinese Players

docs.snippet: A new fence being built by Hungary to stop migrants from entering the country will be completed by May 1 and a state of emergency giving authorities additional powers to secure the borders has been extended by six months, government officials said...
docs.lead_paragraph: A new fence being built by Hungary to stop migrants from entering the country will be completed by May 1 and a state of emergency giving authorities additional powers to secure the borders has been extended by six months, government officials said Thursday.

headline.main: Hungary's 2nd Fence on Serbian Border to Be Built by May 1
headline.print_headline: Hungary's 2nd Fence on Serbian Border to Be Built by May 1

docs.snippet: Chinese buyers including materials giant Amer International and CITIC Securities Co Ltd are readying a rival 246 million pounds bid for English soccer club Southampton, a person with knowledge of the plans told Reuters....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chinese buyers including materials giant Amer International and CITIC Securities Co Ltd are readying a rival 246 million pounds bid for English soccer club Southampton, a person with knowledge of the plans told Reuters.

headline.main: China's Amer, CITIC Line Up Rival Bid for Southampton-Source
headline.print_headline: China's Amer, CITIC Line Up Rival Bid for Southampton-Source

docs.snippet: LeBron James stopped short of plowing into Patriots coach Bill Belichick during the Cavaliers' 103-99 loss in Boston....

headline.print_headline: Near Miss: LeBron Avoids Belichick in Courtside Collision

docs.snippet: A senior lawmaker called it "hysteria." The Foreign Ministry said it was "media vandalism." And the Kremlin lamented the "emotional atmosphere" currently in Washington about Attorney General Jeff Sessions' meetings with a Russian diplomat, saying ...
docs.lead_paragraph: A senior lawmaker called it "hysteria." The Foreign Ministry said it was "media vandalism." And the Kremlin lamented the "emotional atmosphere" currently in Washington about Attorney General Jeff Sessions' meetings with a Russian diplomat, saying it could thwart efforts to mend relations.

headline.main: Kremlin: Sessions Uproar an Impediment to Fixing Relations
headline.print_headline: Kremlin: Sessions Uproar an Impediment to Fixing Relations

docs.snippet: Sevilla moved within two points of La Liga leaders Barcelona with a 1-0 home win over Athletic Bilbao on Thursday, while Atletico Madrid's Fernando Torres was knocked out in a aerial clash at Deportivo La Coruna and taken to hospital....
docs.lead_paragraph: Sevilla moved within two points of La Liga leaders Barcelona with a 1-0 home win over Athletic Bilbao on Thursday, while Atletico Madrid's Fernando Torres was knocked out in a aerial clash at Deportivo La Coruna and taken to hospital.

headline.main: Sevilla Edge Athletic, Atletico's Torres Suffers Head Injury
headline.print_headline: Sevilla Edge Athletic, Atletico's Torres Suffers Head Injury

docs.snippet: House of Representatives Democratic leader Nancy Pelosi said on Thursday that Attorney General Jeff Sessions "lied under oath" and called for his resignation or removal from office....
docs.lead_paragraph: House of Representatives Democratic leader Nancy Pelosi said on Thursday that Attorney General Jeff Sessions "lied under oath" and called for his resignation or removal from office.

headline.main: House Democratic Leader Calls for Sessions' 'Resignation or Removal'
headline.print_headline: House Democratic Leader Calls for Sessions' 'Resignation or Removal'
